caption.center: Frank HALL, Movant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Opposed.

opinion.attorneys:
Edward L. Allen, of Prestonsburg, for movant.
J.D. Buckman, Jr., Atty. Gen., and John B. Browning, Asst. Atty. Gen., for opposed.
opinion.opinion_text:
Motion for an appeal from the Floyd Circuit Court by Frank Hall from a judgment convicting him of assault and battery and fixing his punishment at a fine of $100 and confinement for 30 days in jail.
A consideration of the record discloses no error prejudicial to movant's substantial rights and the judgment is affirmed.
